channel.title: heavy metal on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in heavy metal on funPlantGenes

item.title: BjCET1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BjCET1 Gene Name: cation-efflux transporter 1 Genome: Species: Brassica juncea Functional Descriptions: BjCET1 contains 382 amino acid residues, including a signature motif of the cation diffusion facilitator protein family, six classic trans-membrane-spanning structures and a cation-efflux domain.

item.title: GhMT3a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMT3a Gene Name: Metallothionein-like Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton metallothionein GhMT3a, a reactive oxygen species scavenger, increased tolerance against abiotic stress in transgenic tobacco and yeast.

item.title: JrVHAG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: JrVHAG1 Gene Name: vacuolar H+-ATPase G 1 Genome: Species: Juglans regia Functional Descriptions: JrVHAG1 is involved in plant abiotic strss response.

item.title: MdSAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSAT1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple MdSAT1 encodes a bHLHm1 transcription factor involved in salinity and drought responses.

item.title: MusaDHN-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MusaDHN-1 Gene Name: SK3-type dehydrin Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: MusaDHN-1, a novel multiple stress-inducible SK3-type dehydrin gene, contributes affirmatively to drought- and salt-stress tolerance in banana.

item.title: SbHMA3a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sobic.002G083000 Gene Symbol: SbHMA3a Gene Name: HMA3 transporter Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: Sorghum Ionomics Reveals the Functional SbHMA3a Allele that Limits Excess Cadmium Accumulation in Grains.
